org.apache.velocity.tools.plugin.taglib.model
Class Taglib

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.velocity.tools.plugin.taglib.model.Taglib

@ObjectCreate(pattern="taglib")
public class Taglib
extends Object

It represents a Tag Library, as read from a Tag Library Descriptor.
